评论详情: Not very comfortable. Not much space from sole to top, so my toe pushes up against the upper part of the show.

评论概述: Same size as my Hobibears but less roomy
评论详情: I liked the style of both the black/white and black/gum but returned both pairs. The size 12 was identical in length to my Hobibear size 46 but I think the extra padding in the heel made them too tight. Unfortunate. Didn’t reorder the size 13 because I have too many pairs of shoes. Maybe next time!

These are my first barefoot style shoes. I feel in love. I don't foresee buying a different brand of shoe ever again. I've been wearing them daily for about a month, detailing boats, working out, everyday life, walking around the city, etc. Once your feet get used to the barefoot feeling (my feet were pretty sore for the first couple of days, it felt like I was walking around everywhere barefoot, go figure) your balance is better, your ankles are more stable, your feet don't feel crammed at the end of the day. For me, it's the perfect shoe. Not to mention I can climb up a 45 degree painted surface like in the video and they have grip like a geckos foot.

These have been my 'daily drivers' for at least a year now. They're plenty roomy and are just overall comfortable. It took a little getting used to the look of the slightly wide base since I've had traditional tapering shoes my whole life but after a while, I barely notice. 10/10 happy feet.

I bought these for my fiance who has very wide and flat feet. He likes them, they are wide enough and he says they’re comfortable and lightweight. They are stylish. They are a bit slick on smooth or wet surfaces. They do seem like they won’t last crazy long but for the price I can’t complain

评论概述: Sweet Classic Canvas Gum Sole! (They better last)!
评论详情: My karate instructor sold shoes like these at his gym and I wore them all the time. The gum sole is stickier than safeTstep so they're great for work. You might want to replace or just ditch the stock insoles. We'll see how tough they are, but 5/5 for now.

These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. They fit the size chart and don't feel loose, as some of the comments have expressed. However, I do have very wide feet and usually wear flip-flops most of the year. I added elastic laces for additional comfort.

I really like wearing these whenever I can’t wear slides. I wear them to work, to the store, in the car, in the grass, and anywhere I want. The canvas lets my feet breathe as does the wide toe design. They’re very comfortable, flexible, and light. It’s been a few months now and they’re still holding up well.
Comfortable for a while but seemed to wear out kind of soon

I bought two pairs of shoes from this company, and both lasted about 7 months. Maybe $30.00 shoes are only supposed to last a few months. Unfortunately, the pair I have on now currently have a gapping hole in the bottom. Before purchasing these shoes, I'd really consider paying more for shoes that won't fall apart a short while after you leave a good review. You'll end up paying more every 7 months for these anyways.

I've been wearing them for a couple of weeks now. So far I'm happy with them and i like the style. They are definitely wide enough for my foot which has been a challenge, but they are perfect for my wide foot.

评论概述: These are my new favorite shoes.
评论详情: My feet never get tired when wearing these.
Great shoes. Why buy $150 "barefoot" shoes with a fancy upper when the sole wears out at the same rate as these? Duh!

Another great shoe from this company. I love the look of this style and this one is a canvas material, which i really like along with the two tone theme. It has a little less arch support, but not as bad as the more standard shoe I had bought from Whitin previously. highkly recommend if you like their barefoot shoes.
They look and feel great. After having them for a while I bought a second pair to have a second color. Love these.

The toebox was not as wide and soles were thicker than expected of Barefoot shoes. When wet especially during rain the traction was horrible. Almost slid a couple of times. These shoes seem like they're made for indoors because that's only when it's grippy.

I purchased a pair of these shoes in April. It is now October. I wear them all the time. I work in them. I skateboard in them. They are made so well. The soles don’t even look worn. The canvas upper has held up remarkably well. I have wide feet and struggle to find comfortable shoes. These hit the mark!! The wide toe area makes it feel like I’m not even wearing shoes. When it’s time to purchase another pair, I will be ordering these again.
The shoes are very comfortable and breathe very well. The only issue I have with them is if you drag your feet at all it sounds like you have birds taped to your feet.
These are very cheap quality shoes. Something I would expect from Walmart for $10. Frayed right out of the bag... They don't come in a box. Fit good though
Los he utilizado un par de veces para mis entrenamientos de piernas y se sienten genial. Da una mejor estabilidad en el pie al hacer sentadillas

These shoes are exactly what I wanted. Had VFFs but never got used to the separate toes. These are wide so my foot can splay and not to shallow either for my high instep.  Truly flexible but just thick enough of a sole to have just a little cushion. Hopefully they last because they are 1/3 the price of mainstream competitors. If you like xero shoes sandals, picture that but in a shoe.

Read the other reviews, the popping noise is real.  I didn't think I'd have that issue but I could hear it as I walked.  I think it's the canvas being too stiff, makes me wonder if the canvas material is real.

评论概述: My big wide feet love these shoes.
评论详情: I have five different pairs of this brand of shoes. These are super comfy. I'm a teacher, wear them to school (hard floors, some days I walk 10,000+ steps) and have had to sprint 15 blocks in them chasing a student. I also wore them to Europe where I walked from sun up to sun down pretty much every day and I never had to swap them out or even get thicker socks.  I tried one of their canvas shoes and the fit was not high enough, but these mesh ones are great for wide (mine are wide) and thick (with high arches that won't fit in a lot of shoes). I was worried the flatness of this shoe would not be comfortable but I have never had an uncomfortable day in them.

This is the first barefoot, foot-shaped shoe I have had and it is amazing. I will never go back! I had used Sketchers for most of my shoes recently but my feet (over the years) have been progressively hurting more and more. Day 1 of this shoe was a world of difference. It bends with my foot, crouching, getting up on my tip toes, and general walking has felt completely different.

Just did a day trip in new York is these. Was able to walk and not feel much foot issues (plantar fasciitis). It does feel different than the standard shoe. But it does get comfortable very easy. First pair of barefoot wide toe box shoes and definitely ready to get into these kind of shoes
slightly narrower than my first pair, but wider than my third, I'm told they look better than my crocs in social situations
Really great for the price only thing I can suggest is to get 1 size bigger than you think you need because remember using these shoes will make your feet wider.

These shoes are insanely comfortable and look really good. They also seem to be holding up just fine. But, the soles make a weird popping noise while walking. I have other styles of WHITIN Barefoot shoes that don't do this. These would be great shoes, if not for this.
Shoe

评论概述: Bonitos, pero la talla no es perfecta.
评论详情: Pidelos media talla más arriba, porque son pequeños de largo. El ancho es perfecto.

Honestly, this pair of shoes is the best pair of shoes I own currently. I love this pair of shoes I can fully spread out my toes inside of these shoes, I’ve never had a pair of shoes like that before. It literally feels like I’m walking barefoot, all of the pros and none of the cons. I got a size up, and it’s so worth it! These shoes are super flexible, minimalistic barefoot shoes, great toe box.  I recommend getting a shoe size up for more room. These shoes are perfect! I highly recommend getting a size up, these shoes are awesome. AND THE PRICE IS SO LOW!!! GREAT DEAL!! It’s a steal, I will be getting more, and will be gifting to others too.🎁

评论概述: Love these shoes! Comfy but make a weird floppy noise when I walk!
评论详情: Love these shoes! Comfy. Stylish. Wide. Feel great! Only downfall is they make a weird flopping sound similar to when shoes are wet and sort of flop around. So you can hear me coming from across the workroom. If i could figure out how to make them quiet they would be perfect! Buying the hightops next!
My son (17) loves the feel of these shoes.
Recommended fit was spot on and these are quite comfortable. Could be more flexible and the rubber soles squeak more than any shoe I've ever owned but a good pair to see if barefoot shoes are for you

I do love this style, but these shoes arrived with no laces and animal hair outside and inside the shoes. Clearly used, but sold as new. Accidents happen - I get it. Wish I didn't have to go to the trouble of a return when the accident was theirs.

Other than the sizing issue noted below, I love these shoes.  They are lightweight and comfortable and I love being able to flex and wiggle my toes.  The traction is so good that they don't slip on a vinyl or laminate floor like many other shoes do.I recommend buying 1/2 size larger than usual.  Here's why:  I bought a size 8 and found that it lacks the toe wiggle room of "WHITIN Women's Canvas/Leather Barefoot Shoes | Wide Width Minimalist Sneakers | Classic Fit Low Top" in size 9.5.  According to the size charts, the measurements are supposed to be identical, but they pressed down on the top of my toes until I removed the insole.  The women's 9.5 is almost an inch longer than my feet and the men's 8 gives me less than 1/2 inch.  The result is my toes bump the end of the shoe when going down hill.  I will order again, but next time I will order an 8.5.
They feel good, I really like how wide and flat they are

Best shoes I've ever owned. I got some waterproofing wax and applied that and now I have durable, waterproof, inexpensive, barefoot shoes. I need nothing more unless it snows.  WHITIN, PLEASE MAKE BOOTS. Also we the people want leather barefoot shoes! thank you!
Great fit, nice flat minimalist shoes.

I was hesitant to buy these due to never owning barefoot shoes before. My son is flat footed, and also has wide feet and all other brands left his feet hurting by the middle of the day. He has been wearing these for school for almost two weeks and loves them. He is already talking about getting another pair in a different color.
These are the first pair of shoes that have fit and felt good from the moment I put them on! I have very flat feet and these don’t make my feet hurt!
I’m a woman with wide feet, so I get the men’s. Comfy for my toes.
These shoes fit perfectly. The fit is very natural as your feet are able to keep its natural shape. They were shipped on time and packaged very well.
I ordered my normal size and I usually have a little room. These were small. My toes were crammed in the end. Shoes were returned.

These are the second pair of barefoot shoes I purchased and I really like them. I have had them for about six months and I wear them pretty much everywhere. I am a relatively new to barefoot shoes and have only owned two cheap pairs, but when I get another pair it will probably just be another pair of these in a different color.
These fit great and are comfortable but they squeak like a frightened chihuahua!
I have wide flat feet and these shoes actually fit me. On top of that thy are reasonably priced.

评论概述: Very comfortable, wide toe box, light weight!
评论详情: I've only had these on for about 20 minutes, but they are very comfortable. They're light weight, fit snug around the heel and have plenty of rooms for the piggies to spread out. Soles are also very flexible and give good "feedback". What I mean by that is if I step on my phone charger cord I can feel it. Feels like I'm wearing 2-3 pairs of thick socks.  They might feel small when you first put them on. When I put them on I thought my big toes were pushed up against the front end. In reality, I have about 1/4 inch between my big toes and the end of the shoe but the canvas is low so I can feel it touching the tip of my toenails. I'm sure overtime that will work itself out. One of the attached pictures shows where the end of my toe is compared to the end of the shoe.  Love them so far, wearing them to work tomorrow so we'll see how they feel after 10 hours on a concrete floor.

I decided to finally just buy them to try them to see if "barefoot" is all it's cracked up to be or not. For me personally I should kick myself in the ass for not doing it sooner. These shoes are great for walking on almost all surfaces but, it takes some getting used to if all you do is walk on concrete. I spend enough time on concrete for work so on my off time I like to spend more time on a little more natural floor like grass or dirt gravel sand etc. I've worn these on a few easier hikes and my feet never really started hurting at any point. Will definitely be expanding by getting a few more pairs that whittin offer

评论概述: Might work for some, doesn’t work for me.
评论详情: So I should have known this wasn’t going to work for me considering if I stand barefoot too long my back hurts, and I understand this may work for others. I also have a very narrow foot as is so maybe normal shoes are better for me.  I’ve been having this type of shoe marketed towards me for weeks before I decided to try it out, with people talking about how much it helped their posture, back pain, and overall health. As someone who’s had chronic back pain most of my life, I figured I’d give it a shot. Wearing these while standing for just a few hours makes my entire body hurt. If my back pain is normally like a 3, this probably brought it up to a 7. Not to mention, the thin soles let you feel EVERYTHING, and not in a fun, “feel the grass between your feet” kind of way but in a “sensory nightmare, you feel the texture of the pavement below your feet even though you’re wearing socks.” For me this was a great learning moment teaching me I definitely need a supportive shoe and can’t sacrifice that, but I’d say that’s about the only positive thing I have to say about this.
Love the look and style. But these are hard to enjoy. You feel every imperfection of the ground. I have other barefoot shoes that I enjoy. These I'll use seldom.
They are comfortable, I like the wide feel and wide look to them. Not a super thin sole. I already want more of them.

评论概述: Fit like clown shoes and sound like clogs
评论详情: These shoes seem well made until you wear them. I realize they have a wide toe box, but the lack of flexibility in the sole of the shoe makes them look, feel and sound like clown shoes. In addition, they sound like clogs as the stiff soles hit the floor/ground when you walk. I returned them as they just seemed ridiculous. Maybe they’ll work for you or you are trying to put together a Patch Adam’s costume, but they definitely don’t work for me
Light, confortable, very good grip on bottom
Good looking nice and comfy

These shoes are great!!! They are comfortable and flexible, and I love the look. The width makes them perfect. I can't believe the price for the quality. I wear them daily and no signs of wear and tear after three months. My other pair looks new and is over a year old.

I bought these shoes for the Summer weekends, but I am using them almost every day. They are comfortable, look well made, and can be worn with jeans and chinos. They would be great in other colors than black too.

I wear a size 13w in normal shoes, and finding shoes that fit well and look good is a perpetual struggle. This covers both of those marks flawlessly.  As an added bonus, since I started wearing these types of shoes I've noticed an improvement in my joints, due to my feet being able to move naturally.
After wearing about 3 times for short periods, one of the eyelets already fell out of the shoe.  Makes me very nervous for how these will hold up...  I am now past the return window.

My husband has been wearing these on the weekends for a few weeks now and really likes them.  He wasn't sure about the barefoot style, so he wanted to try a low price pair to find out.  These seem to be fairly well-made and look nice.  He likes how wide and spacious they are.  Says they don't crush his toes.  The zero-drop aspect is something he thought he would have to adjust to (calf muscles), but he hasn't noticed any pain or issues from them.

评论概述: Possibly the greatest of all time barefoot shoe brand.
评论详情: There are many barefoot companies, most try to rif you off with overpriced options. I've had 2 whitins for a year. These ones and the trail runner ones that look like a normal shoe. I put them through the washing machine more times than I can count. Abuse them on hikes and running, and working out in them. They are bullet proof and are very comfortable. TLDR, obliterates the competition for a cheap price.
They do look a little dorky but my feet can stretch out.  I wear on days that I will be in my feet a lot and it helps.

I have worn barefoot shoes for a few years. These are not quite as thin soled or flexible as most of the shoes I wear but I love them regardless. The toe box is wide and the shoes are very comfortable. I highly recommend. I just wish I could get them in multiple colors.

Super comfy shoes for low cost. Feet were sore the first few days, but adjusted quickly. The cushioning by the ankles feels like memory foam. Only two down sides, the rubber squeeks if you brush your foot on the ground, and hard to keep clean(for the lighter colors at least), otherwise love them, will buy more.
Nice shoes!!

Bought a pair a few days prior and was very pleased with them.  Ordered a second pair with the gum sole.  W892 model in size 44.  Received a W87 size 45.  Much cheaper made than the pair I should have received. This is twice Whitin has sent the wrong style.  It’s as if they send whatever they have that they believe is close enough to what you order.
These were so uncomfortable. If you're looking for just a fashion shoe, they are good looking but they are not good for walking around all day. Heavy and thin soled.
Hubby loves these shoes uses them for Work rides motorcycle never says that his feet are uncomfortable. First size was a little small so size up.

评论概述: The best low canvas shoes if you have wide feet
评论详情: Very comfortable, and perfect for wide feet if you do not not have a high arch.

The shoes seem quality at first, good canvas and nice padded insoles that are removable. However on the third wear, and without rigorous use, the back of one heel tore. I was excited about them for the price, but won’t be reordering.
This shoe fits like a glove, very comfortable and exactly as described.
Excellent

Good shoes, super casual, good size for me, really cheap actually based on my experience with shoes, are kind of stiff at first maybe trying them for a while might help, but the best thing about it is the barefoot shape and zero drop sole. Nice job

I'm a veteran barefooter and these shoes get my official seal of approval🥇(so far)  They are perfect thickness and the sole feels great and seems durable. I use these shoes for my job as an HVAC installer. I am going to put them through the ringer so we will see how they hold up. I will be fair and judge them accordingly. But as it stands these shoes are WELL WORTH the money and definitely appropriate for people who like to be barefoot
Perfect barefoot shoe! No need to go purchase others for $100+ Quality, comfort and perfect sizing.

评论概述: Tight going in, but worth the money.
评论详情: Love the look and feel. It's tight going in though, even without the insoles. Could use a finger pull on the back. Maybe get rid of the 5th hole, or make the side panels higher. Strings are too long. No heel pad, which I'm happy have have gotten used to, but some people may not want to. It keeps the shoes light though.

Extremely comfortable, lightweight, and well made. You can remove the insole for a more "barefoot" feel, without losing any of the comfort. Nice soft foot bed underneath the removable insole. Will buy again.

Really love these shoes, I'm probably going to buy more pairs of Whitin shoes in the future.  I replaced the insoles with 6mm ones from Run619.com and now my foot fits the shoe very well, so if you have low foot volume like me, you might want to do the same.  These shoes look great, feel great, give me plenty of toe splay room as well as vertical room too.  The quality of construction is outstanding for the price as well!  Compared to the PF Flyer Los I replaced these with, I love the added cushioning around the ankle and the overall thickness just feels very nice.  The padded tongue is comfortable as well.

评论概述: Look good. Makes for a good minimal but it’s a bit stiff.
评论详情: Look good. Makes for a good minimal but it’s a bit stiff.

I've had these for a couple of weeks now.  Pros: - The shoes is very well made, very high quality. - The Canvas seems to be just the right thickness. Not too thin or heavy. - Weight is good for the price. - Shoe box is good - toes are not cramped, but I have been wearing traditional, western shoes, so my toes are formed to them. - Zero Drop seems good. - They have nice padding on the inside, but some may consider this to be a "Con".  Cons: - Soles are fairly flexible, but maybe not as much as some of the more expensive Barefoot shoes.  These probably aren't the best Zero Drop, Barefoot, shoes on the market, but they may be at this price.

I was a little skeptical as to whether or not it was going to be comfortable to wear. But it has blown away my expectations! I no longer have foot pain or lower back pain because my foot is now comfortably placed. It is slightly cushioned on the inside but I don't even notice. Will be definitely getting another pair soon! I'm normally a size 10 in Pumas and I chose the size 10 for this shoe and it fits very well.

评论概述: One of the most comfortable pairs of shoes I've ever worn
评论详情: Time will tell how durable these shoes are, but they are one of the most comfortable pairs of shoes I have ever owned, especially as someone with a really wide foot. I ordered a half-size up from what I normally wear and they fit perfectly. They're very stylish as well. For the price, I am very happy.
Comfortablee
The thing I don't like is that you can't just slip them on. They have to be untied to be put on. They are comfortable
Super nice bearfoot shoes. I use them daily. Light, flexible and very comfortable.
Even with a bunion this shoe is comfortable for my husband’s daily walks. Great value for the $$$$$$.
use this as a stomp around the house shoe. works great only complaint is toe stich came loose after couple days. canvas is great

At first.. But super comfy after a couple of hours. It's surprisingly difficult to find a black canvas gum soled shoe in 11 wide, so I had to buy and try this product. So far I'm very happy with my purchase. If your thinking about it I would buy it.
Came on time. Poor ft

评论概述: A decent but noisy entry-level zero drop shoe
评论详情: These a are good looking minimalist shoes but they do have some problems. The shoe is zero drop, however, they still feel a bit thick and don't flex as much as I'd like. That could just be a personal preference thing though. They are noisy shoes to walk in. The toe end of the shoe pops back to shape after each step, making it very annoying to walk in. I've only had these shoes for a few days so this might go away over time. What's interesting is that they make less noise if you walk with a heel strike, but this is not a healthy habit to develop when walking in thinner shoes. The shoe is comfortable and if the noise issue goes away with regular use, I could see it being a decent choice for someone who is looking to transition into zero drop footwear.

Great shoes! I have been waiting to try out a wide toe box shoe for awhile now but the price was always a factor. When I saw these listed at $29 I had to jump on it, and I don’t regret it. These shoes seem to be good quality, are light, and plenty of room for my poor previously crushed toes and foot bones. They are meant to feel like bare feet, and I could see forgetting you even have them on, which brings the thought of support to mind. I have been wearing them to get my 10,000 steps in and so far so good, but I will try to update how they hold up, and if maybe an additional orthotic might be helpful, but so far it doesn’t need it. Right now I’m loving them!

Great shoes, some spots still need to stretch a little bit. But, so far the sizing chart is accurate for me and not too thing sole and not too thick either. Flexible, shape of the foot, wide. Amazing for $30.

Se sienten muy bien hechos a un súper precio, especialmente si se comparan con las marcas líderes de calzado minimalista.  Los utilizo solamente para pasear a mi perro y para usarlos en casa, por qué honestamente aún no me acostumbro al look de punta ancha.  Después de un par de meses he notado que cuando utilizo algún par de tenis mas "mainstream" especialmente los que tienen un drop mas pronunciado, como la mayoría de los tennis runners de hoy en día, ya no se sienten tan comodos y empiezo a extrañar mis tenis minimalistas.  Siento que mi postura es mucho más natural con este tipo de calzado
se ve muy bien, sientes el suelo, excelente precio
Los pies duelen al poco tiempo de usarlos, no los recomendó a menos que los uses por periodos cortos o en ambientes controlados.
Me gustó mucho el diseño y el color, son demasiado cómodos es sin duda la mejor opción

A diferencia de otros zapatos tipo "barefoot" encuentro estos más cómodos de la suela, ideales para uso diario. La calidad de los materiales, uniones y costuras interiores y exteriores es excelente, y el agarre de la suela en seco y húmedo es muy buena. También resultan faciles de limpiar
Los uso para caminar, lo maximo fueron 12 jms y no me dolieron los pies para nada, se me hicieron excelente
son muy comodos y a muy buen precio
Cómodas, ligeros, camino varias horas al día y están de maravilla no me fatigó al usarlas. . . Recomendables
